option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: export ODOO_DB_HOST_PORT=9432 ODOO_WEB_HOST_PORT=9069 ODOO_LONGPOLL_HOST_PORT=9072 ADDON_UPDATE_LIST=cm_custom,external_ids,hr_employee_name_extended,disable_odoo_online,discuss_record_links STATE_ROOT=${HOME}/odoo-ai/cm-local && if [ -f tmp/stack-env/cm-local.env ]; then docker compose -p odoo-cm --env-file tmp/stack-env/cm-local.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker/config/_restore_ssh_volume.yaml -f docker/config/cm-local.yaml down --remove-orphans; fi && rm -rf "$STATE_ROOT" && uv run deploy deploy --stack cm-local --skip-upgrade --skip-health && until docker compose -p odoo-cm --env-file tmp/stack-env/cm-local.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker/config/_restore_ssh_volume.yaml -f docker/config/cm-local.yaml exec -T database pg_isready -h localhost -U odoo >/dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 1; done && docker compose -p odoo-cm --env-file tmp/stack-env/cm-local.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker/config/_restore_ssh_volume.yaml -f docker/config/cm-local.yaml run --rm web /odoo/odoo-bin --stop-after-init -d cm --without-demo=all -i base && docker compose -p odoo-cm --env-file tmp/stack-env/cm-local.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker/config/_restore_ssh_volume.yaml -f docker/config/cm-local.yaml run --rm script-runner /odoo/odoo-bin -u "$ADDON_UPDATE_LIST" --stop-after-init -d cm && docker compose -p odoo-cm --env-file tmp/stack-env/cm-local.env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker/config/_restore_ssh_volume.yaml -f docker/config/cm-local.yaml up -d database script-runner web
